title: Work Work Work, ahahahfashfasfashfasfafasfa Work work bfhafha dur dur dur.
body:
Ok, Lonely Canadian Girl here. 

I just want to discuss something with you, my friends. 

So I make posts in GD, and Team recruitment when I am looking for people to play games or just some fun GD type stuff. 

Anyway, you may notice I add a little bit of humour into my posts, such as the name I give myself, or general fun requirements for players i am looking to play with. Many people understand the humour and get it, but others not so much. Just wondering why that is?

Why are some people missing such a key part of personality. 

The entire point of me posting anything that sounds "thirsty" is to get attention. Why? To play some games of league with. If you open up my posts because you are drawn in because of that, its obviously working. Marketing my friends. 

Please if you have only negative things to say, refrain from replying to my posts that I make.

I know what I am doing. 

Thank you for listening to my little rant <3. 

xoxo. BADGALRlRl.
